title: Exttraction Process
question: steam at high pressure and temperature / stim dalam bertekanan dan suhu yang tinggi
kill microorganisms and soften the pulp / membunuh mikroorganisma dan melembutkan sabut
oil palm fruits are detached from their brunches / buah kelapa sawit dileraikan daripada tandan
separate the pulp from the shell / mengasingakan sabut daripada tempurungnya
squeezed with hydraulic or spindle press / diperah dengan penekan hidraulik atau skru
pulp fibres are separated from the palm oil / gentian sabut diasingkan daripada minyak sawit
steam is flowed through the palm oil to remove odour and eliminate acid / stim dialirkan melalui minyak sawit untuk menghilangkan bau dan menyingkirkan asid
palm oil flows through activated carbon to be decolourised / minyak sawit disalurkan melalui karbon yang diaktifkan untuk melunturkan warnanya
